Black

Rank: 769


Michelle- a disabled girl who can't see- hear- or speak- suffering in a world that has given up on her. But when the teacher Debraj enters her life- he becomes a ray of hope that she might pursue her passions and have a normal life.


Director: Sanjay Leela Bhansali

Writer: Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Bhavani Iyer, Prakash Kapadia

Stars: Amitabh Bachchan, Rani Mukerji, Shernaz Patel

Tags: Drama
